text: The following lists the events of the 1923 Philadelphia Phillies season. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Notable transactions === * May 22, 1923: Lee Meadows and Johnny Rawlings were traded by the Phillies to the Pittsburgh Pirates for Cotton Tierney, Whitey Glazner and $50,000.Cotton Tierney page at Baseball Reference === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
